summary: Request to hide the isolateExecutionTimeout worker option and default to the workflow task timeout instead, as there are already many exposed options and isolates are entered multiple times during a single workflow task execution.
userImpact: Simplifies worker configuration by reducing exposed options while maintaining sensible defaults based on workflow task timeout.
proposedFix: Hide the isolateExecutionTimeout option and default to workflow task timeout
keyQuote: There are already a lot of exposed options, it'd be better to default to the workflow task timeout.
